about_flaskblog_text:
FlaskBlog is a blog platform written in [Flask](https://flask.palletsprojects.com/), that's designed to be *simple*, *fast*, and *not distracting* (as in not distracting the user from the article).
It has everything you need:
- [Markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/) support (through [EasyMDE](https://github.com/Ionaru/easy-markdown-editor) and [Mistune](https://mistune.lepture.com/))
- Many configuration options
- Simple UI/UX
- Account roles (if you have more than one person working on the blog, e.g. writer and admin)
- *...and much more!*
